body.p: Provides fully searchable, annotated editions of text commentaries written by Assyrian and Babylonian scholars between the eighth and second centuries BCE. The texts commented on include literary, magical, divinatory, medical, legal, and lexical works.
Project Director: Eckart Frahm; Co-Director: Enrique Jim√©nez; Senior Editor: Mary Frazer.
You can find the project's portal at http://ccp.yale.edu
The data set of CCP is created with the oracc suite of tools, created by Steve Tinney. The editions are available on oracc here.
